author: Ground News
title: Ground News - India contributes 2nd tranche of USD 5 million annual contribution to UNRWA for welfare of Palestinian refugees
text:
Summary by Ground News UN agency is struggling to keep up its functioning in the middle of the Israel-Hamas war in Gaza. UNRWA carries out direct relief and works programmes for registered Palestinian refugees . The Government of India had released the first tranche of its annual commitment in November, about a month ago. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
The Print Center High Factuality India contributes 2nd tranche of USD 5 million annual contribution to UNRWA for welfare of Palestinian refugees Jerusalem, Dec 28 (PTI) Amid the ongoing war in Gaza, India on Thursday released the second tranche of 2.5 million US dollars to the United Nations Relief and Works Agency for Palestinian Refugees (UNRWA), fulfilling its annual commitment of 5 million US dollars for the year 2023-24. UNRWA, functional since 1950, carries out direct relief […]
